title: Fizik power up eMTB shoe, the Terra Ergolace X2 flats to meet ebiking demands
content:
Fizik are expanding their eMTB specific range with an all-new flat pedal shoe made specifically to meet the demands of eMTB. The Fizik Terra Ergolace X2 shoe is a wider platform version of their original Terra Ergolace flats, meant to give a better pedal connection and reduce the risk of foot roll. Let’s see what […]
